title: The provision for CSS shall not be made mandatory by the Electricity Distribution Company in each development
clause_text: The provision for CSS shall not be made mandatory by the Electricity Distribution Company in each development. The experts in Electricity Distribution Company shall assess the requirement of CSS considering the existing facilities available in the neighborhood.
